section.p: Ringhorn receives goods from all along the Rese River, trading along the coast from Uttaku to Yellowport and south to distant Ankon-Konu. It is a very large, bustling city.

p.if: You can buy a town house here for 150 Shards. If you want to do that, cross off the money and put a tick in the box by the town house option.
